description:
Desktop Football 2 has received an all new variety of uniforms! Dress your original team in unique uniforms and challenge the best of the best in tournaments!

Variety Uniform Pack includes the following content:
・Comes with 15 types of uniforms
・5000 points (worth 10 Capsule FK)
・Unlocks 10 previously existing uniforms (excluding downloadable content)

*With the exception of downloadable content, if previously existing uniforms have already been unlocked, the number of your attained uniforms will be added onto starting from the top of the list. If the number owned would exceed the maximum amount possible, you will instead receive 1000 points for each applicable uniform type.
name: Variety Uniform Pack
